root.name: Geisha Novia
root.description: OverviewGeisha Novia is the debut game by Swedish independent developer Royal Railway and was released for iPhone and iPod Touch (iOS 5.1 and up) on Jan. 7, 2013. Geisha Novia is a side-scrolling endless swimmer set underwater where you try to survive for as long as you can while earning points by swimming through rings. Your points get higher as long as you don't miss any rings. The game supports Game Center along with achievements and leaderboards.StoryNovia is a young merman from Mermantica who feels he wants to see what's beyond the kingdom. He sets out on a life-long journey to explore every corner of the vast ocean, but unexpected dangers lie ahead.GameplayMove Novia up and down in order to swim through rings to earn points and dodge evil rocks and clams. Aim for the surface and then aim down to perform a nose dive. Grab a star to become invincible and destroy the threat.
